SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config.server

Class ServerConfig

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.ConfigFoundation
com.mimecast.robin.config.server.ServerConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ServerConfig extends ConfigFoundation
Server configuration.

This class provides type safe access to server configuration.

It also maps authentication users and behaviour scenarios to corresponding objects.

See Also:
  • UserConfig
  • ScenarioConfig
  • Serialized Form

    • loadExternalIfAbsent

      private void loadExternalIfAbsent(String key, Class<?> clazz)
      Helper to lazily load an external JSON5 file into the root config map under the given key if the key is absent and a config directory is available.
      Parameters:
      key - Root key to populate in the map.
      clazz - Class to parse the JSON into (e.g., Map.class, List.class).
